subsection.name: Compilation
subsection.p: To build Corsen, you need a Java 2 Standard Edition SDK greater or equals to 5.0, Maven 2.x and Qt Jambi 4.3.3_01.

To compile Corsen, you need to add the environment variable JAMBI_HOME to your system that contains the path to your Qt Jambi installation. Due to a bug in integrate-jnlp-site maven plugin under Windows, your path to JDK must not contain any space (so your JDK can't be installed in C:\Program Files).
First set your current directory to the base directory of Corsen. The next commands works whatever your operating system and the "$" character represent the command line prompt.
